issue.title: [R] Fix CRAN comment on map_batches collect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15325](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15325). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Got the following comment in [build `homebrew-r-autobrew`](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4799447427?check_suite_focus=true):
```java

map_batches: no visible binding for global variable 'collect'
Undefined global functions or variables:
  collect
```
Forgot to use `dplyr::collect` instead of `{}collect{`}.
